content:
# I have successfully moved to the center of the coal resource patch at (17.75, -12.75).
# Now that I am in proximity to the coal patch, I will attempt to place the Stone Furnace at this location.

# Step 40: Attempt to place the Stone Furnace at the coal resource patch.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=17.75, y=-12.75))  # Place the furnace at this position.
print(f"Placed Stone Furnace at {Position(x=17.75, y=-12.75)}.")  # Output the placement information.
